title: 怎么让一个世界不生成怪物和动物？
author: Ba_bb

replies.author: intesr
replies.txt_content:
/mv modify set animals false 禁动物生成
/mv modify set monsters false 禁怪物生成

replies.author: Ba_bb
replies.txt_content:

/mv modify set animals false 禁动物生成
